授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to be familiar with the TOEIC test.
到達目標: Students will be able to improve their vocabulary.Students will be able to improve their understanding of English grammar.
授業方法: Teacher-centred lessonsStudents working aloneSome group work

第1回: Each week, students will work on their homework pack. This is a practice for Part 7 questions. Students will hand-in the answers on the FINAL DAY.
